trends: There has been one other sighting in Koper

divs: Sighting DetailsFirst photo in black and white has diferent shadow like second one in colour. Object traveled a great distance in one minute and it was huge,regarding the distance.Anyway it look like it is nearest to moon.Trajectory changed only once for about 30 degrees.
Summary: Sferic globe,nearest to moon than earth,made a very big distance in one minute.
